revision.comment: Created page with "<noinclude>{{note|This page is here only to be included into other pages.}} </noinclude>:*'''{{c|SPAC_Cross}}''': A player crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Use}}''': A player used the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_MCross}}''': A monster crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Impact}}''': A projectile hit the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Push}}''': A player pushed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_PCross}}''': A projectile crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_UseThrough}}''': {{moreinfo}} :*'''{{c|SPAC_AnyCross}}..."
revision.text: <noinclude>{{note|This page is here only to be included into other pages.}} </noinclude>:*'''{{c|SPAC_Cross}}''': A player crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Use}}''': A player used the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_MCross}}''': A monster crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Impact}}''': A projectile hit the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_Push}}''': A player pushed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_PCross}}''': A projectile crossed the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_UseThrough}}''': {{moreinfo}} :*'''{{c|SPAC_AnyCross}}''': Activated by anything besides actors with {{flag|NOTELEPORT}}. :*'''{{c|SPAC_MUse}}''': A monster used the line. :*'''{{c|SPAC_MPush}}''': A monster pushed the line.
